title: How To Downgrade A Package In Arch Linux
content:
Add this app

$ sudo pacman -S downgrade

Select the package you are targeting

$ sudo downgrade [PACKAGE, ...] [-- [PACMAN OPTIONS]]

Example

$ sudo downgrade opera
